Summary: 4 orange spheres moving uniformly in an eastern direction. Slow at first, then picked up speed unit they were out of sight.
divs: Sighting DetailsI live in Bethlehem PA and I was taking my dog for a walk around 9:15pm EST and watching some neighborhood fireworks. As we returned to our street, I looked up to catch what I thought were more fireworks. Except these four objects hovered overhead, didn't make any noise and didn't turn colors or lose their luster after a few seconds. I stopped to watch as the objects started to move east all at the same time. They kept the same direction and same speed for about a minute and then they sped up for a quick second and then continued at the slower speed until they were out of sight. The whole event was probably about 5 minutes long. All 4 objects were uniform in all of their motions... almost seeming like they were tied together.
